brunswick.neighborhoods: Downtown, Bowdoin College area, Maquoit Bay
brunswick.meetingHighlights: College-town meetings near Bowdoin; Midcoast recovery hub; welcoming small-town atmosphere.
brunswick.transitInfo: Amtrak Downeaster service; Portland Jetport (PWM) nearby; US Route 1 access.

portland.neighborhoods: Old Port, Arts District, East End, West End, Back Cove, Deering Center, Munjoy Hill
portland.meetingHighlights: Maine's largest recovery community with diverse Old Port meetings; strong young people presence; active year-round.
portland.transitInfo: Metro bus service; Portland Jetport (PWM); Amtrak Downeaster to Boston.

bangor.neighborhoods: Downtown Bangor, West Side, East Side, Bangor Waterfront
bangor.meetingHighlights: Central Maine recovery hub serving Northern and Eastern regions; active downtown meetings; strong service tradition.
bangor.transitInfo: Community Connector bus service; Bangor International Airport (BGR); I-95 corridor.

lewiston.neighborhoods: Downtown Lewiston, Bates College area, Riverside, Tree Streets
lewiston.meetingHighlights: Twin Cities recovery serving Lewiston-Auburn; mill-town heritage; diverse French-speaking and English meetings.
lewiston.transitInfo: Citylink bus service; Auburn-Lewiston Municipal Airport (LEW); Turnpike access.
